text: The 2013 All Thailand Golf Tour is the 15th season of the All Thailand Golf Tour, the main professional golf tour in Thailand since it was established in 1999. ==Tournament results== The table below shows the 2013 schedule. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%" !Date !! Tournament !! Location !! Prize money men (฿) !! Prize money women (฿) !! Men's winner !! Women's winner |- | 17 Feb || Singha E-San Open || Singha Park Khon Kaen Golf Club || align=right|3,000,000 || align=right|200,000 || Prayad Marksaeng || Kanphanitnan Muangkhumsakul |- | 21 Apr || Singha Pattaya Open || Burapha Golf Club || align=right|3,000,000 || align=right|200,000 || Kwanchai Tannin || Jaruporn Palakawong Na Ayutthaya |- | 12 May || Road To Panasonic Open Singha Bangkok Open || Bangpakong Riverside Country Club || align=right|2,000,000 || align=right|200,000 || Prayad Marksaeng || Kanphanitnan Muangkhumsakul |- | 26 May || Road To Panasonic Open Singha Championship || Naraihill Golf & Country Club || align=right|2,000,000 || align=right|200,000 || Baek Seuk-Hyun || Budsabakorn Sukapan (a) |- | 30 Jun || Road To Panasonic Open Singha All Thailand Championship || Laem Chabang International Country Club || align=right|3,000,000 || align=right|200,000 || Jazz Janewattananond || Tanaporn Kongkiatkrai |- | 21 Jul || Singha Hua Hin Open || Royal Hua Hin Golf Course || align=right|2,000,000 || align=right|200,000 || Phachara Khongwatmai (a) || Pornanong Phatlum |- | 11 Aug || Singha Chiangmai Open || Mae Jo Golf Club and Resort || align=right|2,000,000 || align=right|200,000 || Thammanoon Sriroj || Suchaya Tangkamolprasert (a) |- | 3 Nov || Singha Classic || Royal Hills Golf Resort & Spa || align=right|2,000,000 || align=right|200,000 || Thitiphun Chuayprakong || Sherman Santiwiwatthanaphong (a) |- | 22 Dec || Singha All Thailand Grand Final || Singha Park Khon Kaen Golf Club || align=right|3,000,000 || align=right|200,000 || Chawalit Plaphol || Tanaporn Kongkiatkrai |- | 3 Feb 2014 || Singha Masters || Santiburi Country Club Chiang Rai || align=right|5,000,000 || align=right|300,000 || Poom Saksansin || Porani Chutichai |} ==References== Category:All Thailand Golf Tour All Thailand Golf Tour
